author: mmusich
body:
Greetings,
in recent releases `SiStripRawToDigiModule` expects to be configured for:
   *  `LegacyUnpacker`  : https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/137e7014743a17b31d234e8d71a45fa92543959a/EventFilter/SiStripRawToDigi/plugins/SiStripRawToDigiModule.cc#L37
   *  `DoAPVEmulatorCheck` : https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/137e7014743a17b31d234e8d71a45fa92543959a/EventFilter/SiStripRawToDigi/plugins/SiStripRawToDigiModule.cc#L48

Both of those parameters have no default and are not defined in `EventFilter/SiStripRawToDigi/python/FedChannelDigis_cfi.py`, giving issues at runtime when trying to reconstruct events from the Cosmic Rack (see [details here](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/CosmicRackTracking#cRACK_tracking_code_setup)). 
To solve this issue, I've copied the value of those parameters from `EventFilter/SiStripRawToDigi/python/SiStripDigis_cfi.py`
title: [10.1.X] Add leftout parameters for FedChannelDigis
